thread.title: Steve Bannon trolls White House reporters | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Steve Bannon trolls White House reporters | Daily Mail Online

author: Francesca Chambers
title: Steve Bannon trolls White House reporters | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Trump's chief strategist Steve Bannon strolls by White House reporters, says it's 'the opposition party, all lined up' Journalists were camped out in front of White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer's office, awaiting comment on the news of the day Trump's chief strategist Steve Bannon and White House Chief of Staff Reince Preibus emerged from within 'The opposition party, all lined up,' Bannon quipped as he passed by He's been using the term to describe the mainstream press for several weeks in interviews, but it's the first time he's been observed saying it to reporters' faces Published: 23:25 GMT, 15 February 2017 | Updated: 13:12 GMT, 16 February 2017 42 shares
